permissions.title: Permissions Management
permissions.subtitle: Manage role-based permissions and access control
permissions.forbiddenDesc: You don't have permission to access this page
permissions.selectMenu: Select a menu to manage permissions
permissions.managePermissions: Manage action permissions for this menu
permissions.noActions: No actions defined for this menu
permissions.selectMenuToStart: Select a menu from the tree to manage its permissions
permissions.roleModeDesc: Use roles to manage permissions for groups of users.
permissions.userModeDesc: User-level permissions are added on top of role permissions.
permissions.selectUserToManage: Select a user to manage direct permissions
